description:
When we talk about Marvel movies, we’re usually talking about Marvel Studios movies — the ones that tie into The Avengers and are distributed by Disney. But the Marvel Comics stable of characters is actually spread all over Hollywood. Marvel sold off the film rights to various studios in the ’80s, and it wasn’t until the mid-’00s that they began collecting them back to launch the Marvel Cinematic Universe.当说到漫威电影，我们通常都会谈论漫威影业的电影——那些英雄人物在复仇者联盟中集结起来，又被迪士尼所分散开。但是漫威漫画中的人物实际上遍布整个好莱坞。在八十年代，漫威将电影版权出售给数个制作室，直到2005年左右漫威才开始把这些角色重新收回，以创造属于漫威的电影世界。

As of now, Marvel has regained most, but not all of its properties, and it can be confusing to remember which studio still has which heroes. So The Geek Twins have created a handy infographic laying out exactly which characters live where.到今天，漫威已经收回了大部分，却不是全部的英雄角色，而且如今很难记清究竟哪个制作室拥有哪个英雄角色。因此极客双胞胎制作了一份一目了然的图表，用来表示哪个英雄角色在哪里。

Obviously, this isn’t a comprehensive list of every Marvel character ever. These are just the main characters, and it’s safe to assume that any supporting characters associated with the main characters also belong to the same studio.显然这不是一个列出了每个漫威英雄角色的综合图表。这些只是漫威的主要角色，并且很有可能支持隶属于某个制作室的英雄角色的漫威角色也属于该制作室。

Otherwise, any characters not included on this list can be assumed to be the property of Marvel Studios. Well, aside from Stan Lee, whom the Geek Twins note “is awesome and can go anywhere.”其他不在这张表上的英雄角色也很有可能成为漫威影业的财产。好吧，除了极客双胞胎标注的“很厉害，因此可以去任何地方”的斯坦·李之外。

title: 图解漫威英雄角色最终花落谁家？
